## Public Member Functions

### loadDylib() {#aa3949ea92bf2614064d7303fb0cc3629}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Expected&lt; tpctypes::DylibHandle &gt; llvm::orc::DylibManager::loadDylib (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; DylibPath)</>}>
Load the dynamic library at the given path and return a handle to it.

If LibraryPath is null this function will return the global handle for the target process.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/dylibmanager-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/dylibmanager-h">DylibManager.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lookupSymbols() {#a64e84968129d54de0a32d0d43550ceb4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::vector&lt; tpctypes::LookupResult &gt; &gt; llvm::orc::DylibManager::lookupSymbols (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/orc/dylibmanager/lookuprequest">LookupRequest</a> &gt; Request)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Search for symbols in the target process.

The result of the lookup is a 2-dimensional array of target addresses that correspond to the lookup order. If a required symbol is not found then this method will return an error. If a weakly referenced symbol is not found then it be assigned a &#39;0&#39; value.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/dylibmanager-h/#l00052">52</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/dylibmanager-h">DylibManager.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lookupSymbolsAsync() {#a632bc46fd555571d3c82bbf22c7c928a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::orc::DylibManager::lookupSymbolsAsync (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/orc/dylibmanager/lookuprequest">LookupRequest</a> &gt; Request, <a href="#ae71ec09d3b629cd60c40a90681bf09d3">SymbolLookupCompleteFn</a> F)</>}>
Search for symbols in the target process.

The result of the lookup is a 2-dimensional array of target addresses that correspond to the lookup order. If a required symbol is not found then this method will return an error. If a weakly referenced symbol is not found then it be assigned a &#39;0&#39; value.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/dylibmanager-h/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/dylibmanager-h">DylibManager.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
